action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image is a simple, pixelated graphic composed of several discrete shapes and blocks in different colors. There is a purple 4x4 grid with a plus sign pattern, two large orange rectangles, and a smaller pink rectangle. Additionally, there is a green block with a jagged edge resembling a lightning bolt. The arrangement of these shapes seems random with no apparent pattern or symmetry. The shapes are not overlapping and are set against a plain white background.

DESCRIPTION: The image comprises a series of geometric shapes, each with a distinct color, overlapping to create a complex, mosaic-like effect. The colors include purple, green, pink, and blue, and the shapes form a design suggestive of 3D letters or symbols. The arrangement is abstract without any discernible text or recognizable patterns beyond the geometric configuration. The style appears digital, akin to a pixel art or computer-generated graphic, with a simplified, almost sketch-like presentation.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image is a simple, pixelated graphic composed of several discrete shapes and blocks in different colors. There is a purple 4x4 grid with a plus sign pattern, two large orange rectangles, and a smaller pink rectangle. Additionally, there is a green block with a jagged edge resembling a lightning bolt. Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.

To proceed, I'll need a description of the image you're comparing mine to. Please provide a detailed description, and I will then form a question related to your description to confirm if our images are the same or different.
